title: Client disconnecting (This has never happened to me in the 3 years I have played league)
body: So today this issue began, where my client disconnect randomly and it's quite odd, I tried turning off firewalls, then restarting the client but it didn't help, if more info is needed, i'll be happy to provide some, i'm in deep blip here :/

replies.body: Hey there, hope to get you out of this blip!  Has your ISP, settings, or hardware changed at all? It sounds like your network has taken a hit and losing comms with our services.  If you're on wi-fi, it could be cutting you off too.  I'd recommend starting with our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help rule out some possibilities.
